G

Game - Class in main
Game is a class that implement Runnable, which inits the game and starts game loop in a new thread by passing itself
Game() - Constructor for class main.Game
Inits necessary classes and the game thread.
gameHeight - Static variable in class main.Game
Screen height
gameOver() - Method in class states.Playing
Used for entering the gameover state when the player dies
GameOver - Class in states
Displays death screen
GameOver() - Constructor for class states.GameOver
Inits the death message
GAMEOVER - Enum constant in enum class states.GameState
 
GamePanel - Class in main
The panel where the game will be drawn
GamePanel(Game) - Constructor for class main.GamePanel
Generates a new GamePanel then sets focus to itself for the mouse and keyboard listeners.
GameState - Enum Class in states
Enum for defining the game states
gameWidth - Static variable in class main.Game
Screen width
GameWindow - Class in main
The container for GamePanel
GameWindow(GamePanel) - Constructor for class main.GameWindow
Generates a Fullscreen, undecorated window which has the GamePanel as its content
